mapper.insert: INSERT INTO audio.using_log (ip_addr, time, content, member_id) VALUES(#{ip_addr}, #{time}, #{content}, #{member_id});
mapper.sql: SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS row_num, no, ip_addr, time, content, member_id FROM audio.using_log WHERE ip_addr LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR time LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR content LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' OR member_id LIKE '%'||#{search_word}||'%' ORDER BY no DESC
